text: english speaking course
number one formal greeting

hello mr james i'm glad that you came thank 
you for inviting me to this party mr blue

how are you today i'm great how 
about you i'm well thank you

are you looking for someone yes i am do you 
know mr johnson from star company i only

talked to him on linkedin and i don't remember 
his face is it that man standing over there

i'll go talk to him thank you goodbye 
excuse me sir are you mr johnson

oh no i'm not i'm peter jacker oh sorry by the 
way pleased to meet you oh nice to meet you too

good evening good evening i'm looking 
for mr johnson do you know him
ah that's me are you mr james who was messaging me

yeah i am thank god i found you 
oh it's my pleasure to see you

may i continue the plan we discussed yesterday 
yes please i'm looking forward to hearing it
number two informal greeting

hey katie what's up tim how's it going pretty 
good thanks what have you been up to lately

i have a lot of homework to do this week oh i 
see no wonder you're not chatting with me anymore

don't worry i only have one task 
left so are you gonna do it tonight
maybe or tomorrow

come on don't delay it anymore just get it done 
today all right i'll try by the way where's jenny

hey guys what are you guys talking about 
hello jenny we were just talking about you

and here you are really sorry i'm 
late i had to do the housework

no that's okay let's go to tom's 
house and call him sure let's go
we're here tom

hey how do you do guys we're waiting for you 
thanks for waiting gosh i just spent three hours

doing homework wait really i haven't finished 
it yet he's not like you tim oh come on
okay okay let's go now
number three asking about family

good morning mr jack good morning 
mrs jones please meet my family

hello mrs joan i'm mary jack's wife and this 
is our daughter linda nice to meet you mrs joan

oh such a good girl how old are you i'm 
six years old oh i see let me introduce

you to my family too my husband and my 
18 year old son are standing over there

so your son is going to university next month 
right yes he is he's going to arizona university

oh is that so congratulations it's our 
pleasure oh i have something to ask

are you working at company a star mr jack yes i 
am do you also work here no but my husband does

wow what a coincidence i know 
it's great to be your neighbor

want to come over tonight mrs jones 
we're gonna have a housewarming party

beautiful i will definitely come we look 
forward to seeing your family tonight mrs jones
number four describe your job
good morning mrs i'm rachel your new neighbor
hello rachel just call me lisa
okay mrs lisa i have some cookies for you

thank you so much you look very young rachel what 
do you do i'm a freshman my major is business

oh really which school do you go to i go 
to western college it's not far from here
oh i know that college my son used to study there

wow what's his job now mrs 
lisa he works as an engineer

he can fix your computer 
but he's not always at home

i see so he's a computer engineer how 
about you mrs lisa me oh i'm quite old now

i have already retired from work i used to 
be a tailor if you have any clothes that need

fixing just give them to me that's great i'll 
give you my coat one day it lost two buttons

come whenever you want young 
girl you're always welcome
number five best friend one

do you have any best friends andy used to he's no 
longer my friend why did he stop playing with you

he had to move to california we haven't talked 
for a long time what did you guys usually do

we played video games and rode bicycles 
how about you lucy who's your best friend

it's a secret and you don't know her well 
that's okay do you guys always hang out

not really we only meet on weekends go shopping 
and watch movies together those are things girls

like to do right you can say so will there 
be anyone who doesn't have a best friend

if yes they must be very lonely why because they 
have to do everything alone and no one helps them

you're right i have to find a new best 
friend soon i can be your best friend

but i don't like shopping and 
watching movies we can do other things
all right
you
